title: Uber-Krispies
directions: Layer in greased pan: Coated kispies, chocolate mix, coated krispies.
Refrigerator for at least an hour. Overnight for best results. Serve chilled.
ingredients: Melt chips and peanut butter together in saucepan. Stir in Krispies, coating the cereal.
Layer in greased pan: Coated kispies, chocolate mix, coated krispies.
Refrigerator for at least an hour. Overnight for best results. Serve chilled.
